query: I want to understand leadership style and motivation of candidates

recommended_assessments.name: OPQ Team Types and Leadership Styles Report
recommended_assessments.description: This OPQ (Occupational Personality Questionnaire) report is based on Belbin's team types and Bass's leadership and reporting styles. Belbins team types: individual preferred role when working in ateam.

recommended_assessments.name: OPQ Leadership Report
recommended_assessments.description: This OPQ (Occupational Personality Questionnaire) report provides a detailed analysis of an individual's leadership potential. It is based on SHL's leading edge Leadership Model, providing a competency based approach to leadership.

recommended_assessments.name: Enterprise Leadership Report 2.0
recommended_assessments.description: Assess and benchmark your leaders against enterprise leadership - the model for leader impact to drive business results in a complex work environment. For more information, visit: https://www.shl.com/en/solutions/identify-develop-leaders/enterprise-leadership/ .

recommended_assessments.name: Occupational Personality Questionnaire OPQ32r
recommended_assessments.description: The SHL Occupational Personality Questionnaire, the OPQ32, is one of the most widely used and respected measures of workplace behavioural style in the world. It sets a high standard of measurement excellence, providing HR professionals and business managers with relevant and accurate information to make fast and well-informed people decisions.

recommended_assessments.name: Manager 8.0+ JFA
recommended_assessments.description: The Manager 8.0+ Job-Focused Assessment is designed for candidates applying to their first leadership positions and includes SHL’s new innovative mobile-first ability assessment, Verify Interactive – Inductive Reasoning. It measures behaviors that underlie successful performance in first-line manager roles across a wide range of industries.

recommended_assessments.name: Marketing (New)
recommended_assessments.description: Multi-choice test that measures the conceptual knowledge of marketing principles, market research, consumer behavior, brand management, sales management, channel management and advertisement management. Graduate, Manager, Mid-Professional, Professional Individual Contributor, Supervisor, in minutes = 9

recommended_assessments.name: Financial Professional - Short Form
recommended_assessments.description: This solution is for mid-level financial institution positions that require Series 6/7 certification. Candidates answer multiple choice questions to measure financial professional aptitude, learning potential, achievement orientation, conscientiousness, persistence and planfulness, self leadership, interpersonal leadership, sales focus and customer focus.

recommended_assessments.name: CSS3 (New)
recommended_assessments.description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of CSS3 and its application in providing style to web documents. in minutes = 8 This assessment measures behavioural tendencies, motivation, and workplace style.

recommended_assessments.name: Technical Sales Associate Solution
recommended_assessments.description: The Technical Sales Associate solution is for entry-level retail positions in which employees proactively sell a specific line of products that requires substantial knowledge about the products and have their pay and/or performance based on sales revenue. Sample tasks for these jobs include, but are not limited to: obtaining detailed product information, promoting products to customers, persuading customers to buy products, and completing a transaction with a customer.
